Title: Vending Machines
Description:
Makes vending machines appear in constant yet random places around the world.

Trade with them by standing in front of them with an item in your hand, standing still, and holding up. Dispensed items are random and vary in value depending on the determined "worth" of your trade. Compatible with some modded items. It may hunger for flesh.

Comes with a new item: Five Pebbsi. Delicious!

[spoiler]This mod is half a joke mod. Don't expect it to be too serious.[/spoiler]

[hr]

Translation help: DeepL.com for the rough translations. Mold223 for refining the Russian translation. Slithers for refining the Spanish translation.
